title: Cleaning Patterns for iRobot® Braava jet™ Mopping Robot
description: This is an instructional video on cleaning patterns for your iRobot Braava jet Mopping Robot. Braava jet mops and sweeps kitchens, bathrooms, and other small spaces in an efficient, systematic cleaning pattern. It automatically selects the correct cleaning method based on pad type and tackles dirt and stains on hard floors.

asset.title: Cleaning Patterns for iRobot® Braava jet™ Mopping Robot
asset.description:
This is an instructional video on cleaning patterns for your iRobot® Braava jet™ Mopping Robot. Braava jet™ mops and sweeps kitchens, bathrooms, and other small spaces in an efficient, systematic cleaning pattern. It automatically selects the correct cleaning method based on pad type and tackles dirt and stains on hard floors.

For more information, please visit http://bit.ly/1RLeEJh.
asset.author: iRobot

transcripts: The Braava jet robto cleans your floors in a predictable pattern. For the best performance, it's important to place your robot in the lower left of the area you want it to clean. A foot away from any walls. To start the robot cleans to the right until it encounters a wall or other barrier. When it has cleaned as far to the right as it can, the robot continues and cleans the area in front and to the left of where it started. Braava jet cleans around any obstacles it encounters and returns to it's original path and resumes cleaning. To complete the job, Braava jet makes a final pass along edges and obstacles. Braava jet then returns to where it started, plays a tone and powers off
